contentSections.desc: The logo I designed for my startup, merainstitute.com. The word "merainstitute" is made up of two words - "mera", meaning "my" in Hindi, and "institute", so the website means "my institute". I decided to focus on the letters "m" and "i" and this logo perfectly captures both these alphabets in a single shape. Designed in MS PowerPoint.

The logo for Lusie, my web app that automates the game of Tambola. I used the number "51" to represent the letters "si" in the word "lusie". The end-result is quirky and very closely resembles the game, housie, which I automated. Designed in MS PowerPoint.
The logo for my Run Finder project. This logo captures the key differentiator of the app which is the ability to analyze tracks seggrageted in sections.

contentSections.imgTitle: Logo for my online portfolio, this portfolio, yes!
contentSections.desc: The logo for this portfolio website, adapted from my Faces illustration. I call this logo "Navi" after my nick name.
